channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Zoom is building a major new data center in the UK
item.description: The UK has been chosen for Zoom’s next big data center, all with data sovereignty and residency in mind.

item.title: L’offre à saisir au pré-Black Friday, c’est ce pack Lenovo à prix cassé qui inclut une tablette avec écran 3K à 144 Hz
item.description: La Lenovo Idea Tab Pro est une tablette Android boostée à l’IA avec une fiche technique musclée avec un SoC véloce, un écran fluide et des accessoires la transformant en un véritable laptop. Lors du pré-Black Friday on la retrouve avec 46 % de réduction.

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important activity, sleep, and health metrics. Unlike some smartwatches, a ring doesn’t need to be charged every day.

item.title: Google and Disney’s YouTube TV war is escalating – Disney is pulling its movies, and coverage of key US elections is affected
item.description: Disney has pulled its titles from Google TV, YouTube, and the Play store.

item.title: Tech companies don’t care that students use their AI agents to cheat
item.description: AI companies know that children are the future - of their business model. The industry doesn't hide their attempts to hook the youth on their products through well-timed promotional offers, discounts, and referral programs. "Here to help you through finals," OpenAI said during a giveaway of ChatGPT Plus to college students. Students get free yearlong […]...

item.title: « C’est de l’espionnage » : la Belgique autorise l’abattage des drones espions
item.description: La base de Kleine-Brogel, qui abriterait des têtes nucléaires, est survolée par des drones. Alors que le ministre de la Défense belge pointe la Russie, l'armée a reçu l'ordre de les abattre.

item.title: Les 25 ans de la Station spatiale marquent aussi la fin d’une époque
item.description: Le 2 novembre 2000 commence l’expédition 1, la première rotation de routine à bord de la Station spatiale internationale. Depuis, grâce aux relèves, l’ISS ne s’est plus jamais retrouvée vide et l’humanité a toujours conservé une poignée de ses pairs dans les étoiles. Vingt-cinq ans plus tard,...

item.title: Avec le casque JBL Junior Free, le son ouvert est pensé pour les enfants
item.description: Alors que le marché des écouteurs s’ouvre de plus en plus aux modèles à conduction ou aérienne, JBL annonce la commercialisation d’un casque spécialement pensé pour les enfants afin qu’ils restent alertes de ce qui se passe autour d’eux.

item.title: Canon just teased its next mirrorless camera and it's coming in two days – here's what to expect
item.description: Canon's next mirrorless camera lands on November 6 – here's what we can learn from the product teaser.

item.title: Another ‘X-Men’ Star Swears They’re Not Back for ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
item.description: Plus, Simu Liu hypes it up as 'a love letter to the entire genre of superhero movies'.

item.title: Hisense U75QG TV Review: Dazzling Punch, Minimal Compromises
item.description: Hisense's midrange TV gets a mega boost of brightness for (mostly) thrilling results.

item.title: Coca-Cola faces backlash again for missing the spirit of the holidays with another AI-slop ad
item.description: Coca-Cola is using generative AI to create its 2025 festive ad, and it's a shame the brand hasn't learnt from last year's disaster.

item.title: This excellent budget Pixel phone is now $300 off at Amazon for Black Friday
item.description: The Google Pixel 9 plummets to a new record-low price of $499 at Amazon for Black Friday.

item.title: Disney+ en novembre 2025 : voici les films et séries à ne pas manquer ce mois-ci, dont quelques succès français
item.description: Un plaid bien chaud, une tasse de chocolat et un abo Disney+, il ne faut pas grand-chose pour passer les soirées froides d'automne. Voici ce qui nous attend en novembre sur la plateforme de streaming.

item.title: Le prix de cette batterie externe Samsung 10 000 mAh dégringole sous les 10 € juste avant le Black Friday
item.description: Compacte et puissante, la batterie externe Samsung d'une capacité de 10 000 mAh peut vous éviter la panne sèche en pleine journée. La bonne nouvelle, c'est qu'en ce pré-Black Friday, elle peut vous revenir à 9,99 euros au lieu de 49,99 euros à la Fnac et chez Darty.

item.title: Squid Game: The Challenge season 2 has already lost steam – just like the Netflix Original series
item.description: Is Squid Game: The Challenge season 2 just as good the second time around? In a word, no... and it's truly failing on all fronts.

item.title: 20 Best Power Banks (2025), I’ve Tested Countless to Find Them
item.description: Keep your phone, laptop, handheld gaming console, and other electronics running with these travel-friendly power banks.

item.title: The best phone 2025 [PPC]
item.description: We've reviewed all of the best phones you can buy, from the most powerful camera phones to the latest Google Pixel and Apple iPhone models. Whether you need long battery life, a productive work phone, or a fun gaming machine, we've got the best recommendations for every budget, with new models added all the time.

item.title: Apple reveals a host of iOS and iPadOS security flaws needing urgent attention - so patch now
item.description: Apple fixes dozens of flaws affecting iPhones, iPads, Macs, and other devices.

item.title: DJI responds to new US drone ban law passed by FCC – here's what it means for you
item.description: With the deadline approaching for DJI to be given the all-clear by the US government, there's been another development.

item.title: Get Ready to Hear a Lot About Robot and AI ‘Swarms’
item.description: Thousands of robo-brains are better than one.

item.title: A new Samsung Galaxy tri-fold video shows off its big bezels and separate cover screen
item.description: We've now had our closest look yet at the Samsung Galaxy tri-fold, revealing various design details.

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is breaking sales records, selling 5.54 million units in latest quarter
item.description: Nintendo Switch 2 sales aren't slowing down as we near the holidays, with units still flying off shelves.

item.title: iOS 26.1 lets you turn down liquid glass’ transparency
item.description: Apple's latest iOS update doesn't introduce major features, but it does bring one highly-requested tweak: the ability to change the transparency of the translucent liquid glass design.

item.title: macOS Tahoe 26.1 has landed – here are the 5 biggest new features for your Mac
item.description: Apple’s macOS Tahoe 26.1 update brings changes to Liquid Glass and some of your favorite apps.

item.title: What to Do in Seattle if You’re Here for Business (2025)
item.description: A tech industry guide to where to stay, eat, work, and play while visiting Seattle.

item.title: Why James Cameron Is Thanked in the ‘Predator: Badlands’ Credits
item.description: 'Badlands' director Dan Trachtenberg talked about the 'Aliens,' 'Terminator,' and 'Avatar' creator's influence.

item.title: Acer Predator Triton 14 AI Review: There Are Few Laptops as ‘Cool’ as This One
item.description: Believe it or not, you want a laptop with stylus support on the trackpad.

item.title: The Mathematician Who Tried to Convince the Catholic Church of Two Infinities
item.description: In the late 19th century, Georg Cantor believed his new theory could help the Church understand the infinite nature of the divine. He miscalculated.

item.title: How a bunch of hackers freed the Kinect from the Xbox
item.description: In 2010, when Microsoft unveiled the Kinect, it pitched the camera as a revolutionary new gaming device. Swing an imaginary lightsaber and that would be translated onscreen. Throw a football and it would be caught on your TV. Fifteen years later, we know the Kinect as an expensive failure. Microsoft overestimated the demand for playing […]

item.title: With Zohran Mamdani, have progressives found their counter to MAGA branding?
item.description: Tyler Evans, creative director for Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and the guy behind Zohran Mamdani’s iconic campaign poster, on the limits (and potential) of great political design. Amid a crowded field of candidates, New York mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani has managed to cut through the clutter—with a campaign poster that challenged every convention of visual design....

item.title: Andrew Cuomo’s run for NYC mayor was him at his Trumpiest: Using AI to bring politics to new lows
item.description: The former governor’s AI-, fear-, and bigotry-fueled campaign to run New York City feels straight out of the Trump playbook. After a double-digit loss in the Democratic primary for New York City mayor, Andrew Cuomo launched his independent bid for the office in June with a video mimicking the style of his primary adversary, Zohran Mamdani. Since then, his campaign seems to have taken most of its cues from the pair’s supposed common adversary, President Donald Trump....

item.title: Nothing cède et autorise la suppression des apps indésirables du Phone (3a) Lite
item.description: Pris dans la tourmente après le lancement de son Phone (3a) Lite, Nothing vient de céder à la pression de sa communauté. D'ici la fin du mois, les utilisateurs pourront désinstaller complètement une partie des bloatwares, qui ne pouvaient auparavant qu'être désactivés.

item.title: Après Shein, AliExpress est épinglé pour vente de poupées pédopornographiques
item.description: Des poupées à caractère pédopornographique ont été découvertes sur AliExpress. La répression des fraudes a identifié sur la plateforme chinoise des poupées sexuelles d’apparence enfantine. C'est une infraction grave passible de lourdes sanctions pénales. AliExpress est aussi accusé de proposer du contenu porno sans mesure de filtrage adéquate.
